lv.emes.libraries.tools

Class MS_GlobalInitializableConstats

  • java.lang.Object
    • lv.emes.libraries.tools.MS_GlobalInitializableConstats

  • public class MS_GlobalInitializableConstats
extends java.lang.Object
    This module can be overridden to operate with constants that is read from .properties file using static way to access them. First of all you need to create a single instance of class, then you can change path to a .properties file. After this you can use method updatePropsFromFile to load everything in class static variables and use them later.

    Normally you just override this class to create more complicated class with more private and corresponding static variables. After overriding be sure you implement (if necessary) setAdditionalProperties and doOnPropertiesReadException.

    Example of use:
    MS_GlobalInitializableConstats consts = new MS_GlobalInitializableConstats("filename.properties");
    consts.updatePropsFromFile();
    System.out.println(MS_GlobalInitializableConstats.DB_NAME);

    Public methods: -changePropsFileLocation -setPropsFileLocation -getCurrentPropsFileLocation -updatePropsFromFile

    Methods to override: -setProperties -doOnPropertiesReadException

    Version:
    1.2.
    Author:
    eMeS

      • MS_GlobalInitializableConstats

        public MS_GlobalInitializableConstats(java.lang.String propertiesFilename)
        Create constants object and set filename of properties file. After this you should call updatePropsFromFile() to read properties from this file into static constant variables.
        Parameters:
        propertiesFilename -

      • MS_GlobalInitializableConstats

        public MS_GlobalInitializableConstats()
        Creates properties file with default name constants.properties. You can also change name of file using method changePropsFileLocation(). After this you should call updatePropsFromFile() to read properties from this file into static constant variables.

    • Method Detail

        public void updatePropsFromFile()
        Overrides default application connection and configuration constants by constants from propertiesFilePath file.
